name: Tank Game (itch) (Lappy Fresh)
description:
Game Controls:

  • R to reload game
  • T to switch map and tank
  • WASD for Player 1 Movement
  • OP for player 1 turret
  • Space for player 1 shoot
  • Arrow Keys for player 2 shoot
  • Numpad 2 and numpad 3 for player 2 turret
  • Numpad enter for player 2 shoot

Map Creator Controls:

  • Hold left click to drop item around
  • Hold right click on item to change angle
  • Double left click to create new item (max 10)
  • Scroll wheel to change sprite
  • Numpad 8,4,6, and 2 change size
